articles.title: Changi Airport Terminal 4 to reopen on Sept 13 amid increased demand for travel - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Sixteen airlines including Cathay Pacific, Korean Air and AirAsia will relocate to T4 progressively.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Changi Airport's Terminal 4 will reopen on Sept 13 after being closed for more than two years due to the Covid-19 pandemic, as demand for travel rebounds.
